doc:
Bebe Neuwirth https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bebe_Neuwirth 0 Beatrice "Bebe" Neuwirth (; born December 31, 1958) is an American actress, singer, and dancer. On television, she played Lilith Sternin, Frasier Crane's wife, on both the TV sitcom Cheers (in a starring role) and its spin-off Frasier (in a recurring guest role). The role won her two Emmy Awards. On stage she played the Tony Award-winning roles of Nickie in the revival of Sweet Charity (1986) and Velma Kelly in the revival of Chicago (1996). Other Broadway musical roles include Morticia Addams in The Addams Family (2010). From 2014 to 2017, she starred as Nadine Tolliver in the CBS drama Madam Secretary. Beatrice_"_Bebe_"_Neuwirth ( ; born December_31_,_1958 ) is an_American_actress , singer , and dancer . On television , she played Lilith_Sternin , Frasier_Crane 's_wife , on both the_TV_sitcom_Cheers_( in a_starring_role ) and its_spin-off_Frasier_( in a_recurring_guest_role ) . The_role won her two_Emmy_Awards . On stage she played the_Tony_Award-winning_roles of Nickie in the_revival of Sweet_Charity_(_1986_)_and_Velma_Kelly in the_revival of Chicago_(_1996_) . Other_Broadway_musical_roles include Morticia_Addams in The_Addams_Family_(_2010_) . From 2014 to 2017 , she starred as Nadine_Tolliver in the_CBS_drama_Madam_Secretary .
